How to Start Your Home-Based Business?

Guidelines

  • Business Address: HDB flat addresses cannot be registered, but private residences can.
  • Business Activities:
    1. Should not adversely affect your neighbours' living environment.
    2. Should not involve the use of heavy equipment or appliances.
    3. Should not require additional workers or staff.
    4. Should not require storage or movement of goods.
  • Advertising: No physical or paid advertising.
  • Rules & Regulation: Depends on the type of business you're setting up.
